mobiles.name: drakyri deriki lechandre deia lady
mobiles.long_description: A winged lady in shimmering blue robes stands here, working on something.
mobiles.description:
Sparkling silver eyes regard you serenely from a fine boned elven face.
Iridescent wings arch from the shoulder blades, spreading behind the lady
in a glittering cloak.  The aura of power surrounding her is nearly
tangible.  You notice a glittering symbol in silvery-blue in the center of
her forehead:

                             ((+*+))

mobiles.name: drakyri deriki noriek deiayan lord
mobiles.long_description: A darkly handsome drakyri lord regards you curiously.
mobiles.description:
Wavy black hair frames a sharp featured elven face, in stark contrast
with the pale skin.  Intelligent silver eyes regard you warily.  A
mark on the hem of his clothing indicates his rank as consort to the head
of major house Deriki, Lechandre.

mobiles.name: drakyri deriki dyrli sh'aya lady
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri lady stands here, involved in an experiment.
mobiles.description:
Golden blonde hair is tied securely back, revealing pointed ears and
flowing in waves over delicate iridescent wings.  The lady, engrossed in
her experiment, does not seem to notice you.  She wears the insignia of
she'vale Deriki and the mark of the first in command.

mobiles.name: drakyri deriki roweni sequas
mobiles.long_description: A slender drakyri hovers here.
mobiles.description:
The second in command of house Deriki, Roweni wields formidable power.
She bears the fine boned features of an elf and the iridescent wings
of the fae.  Pale green eyes watch you measuringly.

mobiles.name: drakyri deriki xanil treye man
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri man robed in blue stands here, efficiently taking notes.
mobiles.description:
A ponytail of silvery hair hangs over the man's shoulder as he bends over
a stack of parchment.  He bears the mark of the treye, third in command,
of she'vale Deriki.

mobiles.name: drakyri deriki tyrena na'deia lady
mobiles.long_description: A young drakyri lady is here, studying.
mobiles.description:
You notice raven black hair and delicate iridescent wings.  Apparently
noticing your scrutiny, the girl turns towards you, fixing you with
a serious silver gaze.  A silvery blue dot shimmers between her eyebrows,
marking her as the heir to Deriki.  When she comes into full power, the
dot will be replaced by the house crest.

mobiles.name: drakyri deriki nalyss ira'deia girl
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri girl grins at you impishly.
mobiles.description:
The girl's silver eyes sparkle with laughter as she watches you watching
her.  A narrow mark along one cheekbone denotes her as one of the
younger siblings (ira'deia) of the heir.

mobiles.name: drakyri deriki daeman ira'deian boy
mobiles.long_description: A young boy hovers here, concentrating on a spell.
mobiles.description:
The intelligent silver eyes are narrowed in concentration as he practices,
seemingly oblivious to your presence.  A blue mark along his cheekbone
indicates that he is a younger sibling of the Deriki heir.

mobiles.name: drakyri deriki ykandres ira'deian youth
mobiles.long_description: A winged youth fades in and out of view.
mobiles.description:
He seems to be perfecting his invisibility and cancellation spells.
Noticing your intrusion, the youth glances up, flipping back short
golden locks to examine you with curious grey-silver eyes.  He
bears the mark of an ira'deian, or younger child, along one cheekbone.

mobiles.name: zeion snow owl
mobiles.long_description: A snow owl the color of blue ice cocks its head at you.
mobiles.description: Huge dark eyes examine you curiously.

mobiles.name: drakyri lab assistant
mobiles.long_description: An assistant rushes around setting up an experiment.
mobiles.description: He seems a little harried and glares at you for getting in the way.

mobiles.name: mage training
mobiles.long_description: A mage in training is here, mumbling an incantation.
mobiles.description:
The mage seems intent on a spell and unaware of your scrutiny.
Suddenly, one hand flicks forward and a fireball whooshes past your
ear!  Ack!  The mage glares at your interruption and mumbles something
about idiots and fried brains.  An odor of singed hair wafts from
your left ear.

mobiles.name: writhing form ghostly
mobiles.long_description: A ghostly form writhes here.
mobiles.description:
A transparent form hovers here, writhing and moaning.  It seems
to be trapped in one place by some kind of magic which apparently
holds despite the form's continuous lashing.

mobiles.name: glyph warding
mobiles.long_description: A protective glyph hovers here.
mobiles.description:
It seems to be made of semi-transparent substance shaped in the form
of a magical glyph, created to guard the house against outside threats.

mobiles.name: drakyri treniste dosandre deian lord
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri lord in gleaming white raises an eyebrow at your intrusion.
mobiles.description:
Light seems to focus on this figure, surrounding the lord with an aura
of gold.  Shining hair is held back by a slender circlet, revealing
a handsome, sculpted face and narrow, almost slitted, tawny eyes.
A golden symbol shimmers between his brows:

                          ((-*-))

mobiles.name: drakyri treniste denylis deiaya lady
mobiles.long_description: A beautiful winged lady gazes out over the city.
mobiles.description:
Shining gold hair catches the light, surrounding the lady with a faint
golden halo.  Bright blue eyes gaze back at you serenely.  You sense
an aura of great power behind the gentle smile.

mobiles.name: drakyri treniste kaele sh'ayan
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri stands here, radiating an aura of command.
mobiles.description:
Powerful golden eyes catch and hold your gaze for a moment, and
one eyebrow raises in question.  He bears the mark of a sh'ayan
on his collar.

mobiles.name: drakyri treniste rexena sequas female
mobiles.long_description: A female drakyri hovers here.
mobiles.description:
A cascade of white streaked golden hair flows in waves over one shoulder.
Despite the white strands, the pale face betrays a youthful power,
and her stance betrays an aura of authority.  She bears the mark of
the Treniste sequas, the second in command.

mobiles.name: drakyri treniste deis treye male
mobiles.long_description: A male drakyri hovers here.
mobiles.description:
Gold flecked blue eyes watch you measuringly from a handsome elvish
face.  On his collar is the mark of the treye, third in command,
of house Treniste.

mobiles.name: drakyri treniste lyrene na'deia girl
mobiles.long_description: A slender drakyri girl is here, reading.
mobiles.description:
Golden hair frames a narrow fine boned face and large tawny eyes.
Though slight, honed muscles betray continuous weapons training and
a catlike speed.  A golden dot on her forehead marks this girl as
the Treniste na'deia, or heir.

mobiles.name: drakyri treniste josreke ira'deian youth
mobiles.long_description: A white clad youth is here, taking notes.
mobiles.description:
He seems focused on a huge blue bound tome.  A glance at the lettering
along the spine indicates that it has something to do with magic.
Along one cheekbone, you notice the tiny mark of a Treniste ira'deian.

mobiles.name: drakyri treniste rodwen ira'deia girl
mobiles.long_description: A young girl is here, practicing sword maneuvers.
mobiles.description:
Steel flashes like lightning as the girl moves through several
maneuvers with a speed and agility that make it seem like a dance.
Noticing your scrutiny, she pauses, and you notice the mark of
an ira'deia along one cheekbone.

mobiles.name: drakyri white paladin
mobiles.long_description: A paladin clad in pure white watches you.
mobiles.description:
The paladin seems to follow your every move, as if measuring your
worth.

mobiles.name: drakyri reykaris rachal deia lady
mobiles.long_description: A raven haired drakyri lady stands here, radiating evil.
mobiles.description:
Raven black hair seems to absorb the little light in the room, framing
a dark, fine boned face and dark slitted eyes.  An aura of power and
evil surround her like a permanent cloak, and strange incantations flow
from her lips.  A black symbol shimmers on her forehead, the mark
of house Reykaris:

                        ->*<-

mobiles.name: drakyri reykaris toryan deiayan man
mobiles.long_description: A tall winged man in black is here.
mobiles.description:
Slitted eyes like slashes of darkness gaze back at you.  You sense
an aura of complete evil and corruption radiating from this man..
He bears the mark of the deiayan (consort) of she'vale Reykaris.

mobiles.name: drakyri reykaris janalis sh'aya lady
mobiles.long_description: A commanding drakyri lady stands here.
mobiles.description:
An aura of power and command radiate from the slender figure.
Despite her beauty, you sense something evil and deadly behind the
blue eyes and pale golden hair.  The mark of the Reykaris sh'aya
is emblazoned along her collar.

mobiles.name: drakyri reykaris dreyva sequas
mobiles.long_description: A black clad drakyri watches you.
mobiles.description:
Dark slitted eyes seem to follow your every move.  You notice the
mark of the Reykaris sequas on her collar.

mobiles.name: drakyri reykaris delyrus treye man
mobiles.long_description: A dark drakyri man stands here, muttering an incantation.
mobiles.description:
He notices you watching him and smiles nastily, sending a shiver
of warning down your spine.  Along the collar is the mark of the
Reykaris treye, the third in command.

mobiles.name: drakyri reykaris kranali na'deian
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri unfurls his wings and snarls at your intrusion.
mobiles.description:
Jet black hair frames a handsome elfish face.  Dark slitted eyes
glare at you angrily.  Between his eyebrows shimmers the black dot
of the heir to Reykaris.

mobiles.name: drakyri reykaris sorina ira'deia child
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri child is here, playing with polished bones.
mobiles.description:
She seems to be playing with a collection of humanoid bones, polished
to a ghastly white gleam.  Noticing your gaze, she giggles and hurls
a skull at you, bearly missing your shoulder.  The dark eyes flash
mischieviously.  You notice a dark mark along one cheekbone indicating
her status as an ira'deia, younger child, of house Reykaris.

mobiles.name: drakyri reykaris loryn ira'deia girl
mobiles.long_description: A slender girl watches you from the shadows.
mobiles.description:
Dark slitted eyes gleam from the shadows, and the thin lips part in
a bitter not-smile.  One hand draws back, and the light glints off
a silvery throwing dagger balanced in her palm.  Along one cheekbone
is the mark of an ira'deia of house Reykaris.

mobiles.name: drakyri reykaris chake ira'deian man
mobiles.long_description: A young drakyri man hovers here, studying.
mobiles.description:
Short, jet black hair frames a narrow face with high cheekbones and dark
slitted eyes.  The mark of an ira'deian glimmers along one cheekbone.

mobiles.name: hellish guardian
mobiles.long_description: A hellish guardian stalks here, looking for prey.
mobiles.description: A rabid reddish light flickers behind narrow green cat eyes.

mobiles.name: howling beast figure
mobiles.long_description: A warped figure screams with fury!
mobiles.description:
A warped figure resembling a huge dog with glowing red eyes and
four long muscular legs ending in wicked claws stands here, straining
against the magic which holds it.  The red eyes glint, and
the long muzzle opens to emit a furious, ear-piercing screech!

mobiles.name: eyes demonic figure
mobiles.long_description: Mad red eyes glint insanely from the darkness.
mobiles.description:
Barely visible in the darkness, you notice a disfigured shape behind
the eyes.  Twisted lips part to reveal cruel white canines.  The
figure emits a threatening snarl..

mobiles.name: wax statue necromancer black figure
mobiles.long_description: A wax statue of a sinister black clad figure is here.
mobiles.description:
The statue is intricately molded and seems almost alive..
The blood red eyes seem to glow with a hellish fire.  Long,
clawed fingers are extended before the figure as if casting a
spell.  As you continue your scrutiny, thin lips draw back in a
blood-freezing snarl, and a trail of very real blood drips from
the gleaming white fangs!

mobiles.name: mass writhing tentacles
mobiles.long_description: A mass of writhing tentacles reaches towards you!
mobiles.description:
Thick black tentacles the width of your head twine and writh
menacingly.  The tentacles part momentarily, and you notice a
round, fanged mouth at the center, dripping blood.

mobiles.name: figure summoned demon
mobiles.long_description: A hulking figure snarls viciously.
mobiles.description: You catch a glimpse of hellish red eyes and wickedly sharp black talons.

mobiles.name: drakyri myrxes jaena deia eyes
mobiles.long_description: Wary silver eyes gleam from the darkness.
mobiles.description:
You make out a slender shape crouched warily in the darkness.  The
silver eyes gleam from a dark, narrow face like twin daggers.
>From the area of the forehead, a silver mark shimmers:

                        -=+)>

mobiles.name: drakyri myrxes neraikis deiayan form
mobiles.long_description: A slim form crouches in the shadows.
mobiles.description:
The slender form of a drakyri is nearly invisible in the shadows.
His wary stance betrays a dangerous catlike grace.  You notice
that he bears the mark of a deiayan of house Myrxes.

mobiles.name: drakyri myrxes katyre sh'aya figure
mobiles.long_description: A black clad figure watches you silently.
mobiles.description:
Lean honed muscles balance with the grace of a cat.  The dark slitted
eyes seem to follow your every move.  Along one dark collar, you notice
the mark of the Myrxes sh'aya.

mobiles.name: drakyri myrxes ryxis sequen
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri stalks in the shadows.
mobiles.description:
Slitted emerald green eyes watch you measuringly from a darkly handsome
elvish face.  The figure seems at home in the shadows and occasionally
merges with them, disappearing from sight.  Along the collar, he
wears the mark of a sequen, second in command of Myrxes.

mobiles.name: drakyri myrxes gydeas treye form
mobiles.long_description: A slender form blends into the shadows.
mobiles.description:
In the darkness, you can barely make out a slim figure and the arches of
dark wings.  Dark slitted eyes glitter dangerously from a fair, fine
boned face.  The mark of the Myrxes treye, third in command, is
emblazoned on his collar.

mobiles.name: drakyri myrxes dyraena na'deia lady
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri lady paces silently.
mobiles.description:
Long hair so black it blends into the shadows frames a pretty, high
cheekboned face and dark, wary silver eyes.  Though not looking
directly at you, the lady seems to be aware of your movements.  Her
smooth, silent gait displays a dangerous, well controlled power.
Between her eyebrows is the mark of the Myrxes heir.

mobiles.name: drakyri myrxes nyxi ira'deia girl
mobiles.long_description: A slender girl stalks in the shadows.
mobiles.description:
The girl moves with a powerful agility that reminds you of a panther.
Slitted silver eyes pierce the darkness to bore into your own.  Along
one cheekbone is the mark of an ira'deia of Myrxes.

mobiles.name: drakyri myrxes delise ira'deia
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri emerges from the shadows.
mobiles.description: Pale green cat eyes seem to glow with a silent power.

mobiles.name: black panther
mobiles.long_description: A black panther prowls silently.
mobiles.description:
Powerful muscles ripple beneath a shadow black coat.  Emerald green
cat eyes flicker constantly around the room, taking in everything.

mobiles.name: shadow lynx
mobiles.long_description: A lynx stalks restlessly in the shadows.
mobiles.description:
The form of a huge, dark lynx is barely visible in the shadows.
Slitted silver eyes flicker towards you, and she hisses in warning.

mobiles.name: night hawk black
mobiles.long_description: The huge form of a shadow black hawk hovers here.
mobiles.description:
She hovers silently, powerful wings outspread.  Beneath the intelligent
dark eyes, a cruel black beak opens to emit a shrill scream of challenge!

mobiles.name: stalker form
mobiles.long_description: A shadowy form slips silently through the darkness.
mobiles.description:
The form flits through the shadows with a dangerous silent speed.
The head turns towards you for a moment, fixing you with a sinister
silver gaze that sends a chill up your spine.

mobiles.name: hunter arrow
mobiles.long_description: You notice the glint of an arrow aimed at you from the shadows.
mobiles.description:
A lithe humanoid form crouches in the shadows, aiming a silvery
arrow at you with dangerous accuracy.

mobiles.name: drakyri xaek dyana deia lady
mobiles.long_description: A powerful drakyri lady watches warily.
mobiles.description:
Your eyes are held by a commanding grey gaze.  The lady seems to assess
you even as you watch her.  She bears the weight of full armor, betraying
honed muscles despite the slender build.  On her forehead is the shimmering
grey mark of myr'vale Xaek:

                        ][+][

mobiles.name: drakyri xaek ryke deiayan lord
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri lord is here, radiating power.
mobiles.description:
Lean, powerful muscles indicate a lifetime of physical training
and weapons work.  Along the collar is the mark of the deiayan (consort)
of the head of house Xaek.

mobiles.name: drakyri xaek nyxil sh'aya
mobiles.long_description: A golden haired drakyri is here, practicing.
mobiles.description:
Flashing swords gleam in a fast, dangerous dance as the lady skims
through sword maneuvers that seem as easy to her as breathing.  Slitted
golden eyes gleam with adrenaline and a commanding power as she glances
up to meet your gaze.  On her collar, she bears the mark of the
Xaek's first commander (sh'aya).

mobiles.name: drakyri xaek rakael sequas female warrior
mobiles.long_description: A female drakyri warrior is here, practicing sword maneuvers.
mobiles.description:
Silver hair and silver eyes flash in the light as the warrior works
gracefully through sword maneuvers.  As she spins and parries with
dizzying speed and grace, she seems almost one with her sword.
She wears the mark of the sequas, second commander, of Xaek.

mobiles.name: drakyri xaek yeven treye man
mobiles.long_description: A well muscled drakyri man glances up from his work.
mobiles.description:
He seems to be going over some sort of maps.  Powerful muscles bulge
beneath leather practice armor, yet he moves with a quickness that
make this man a dangerous enemy.  Emblazoned on his collar, you notice
the mark of the Xaek treye, third commander.

mobiles.name: drakyri xaek versant na'deian boy
mobiles.long_description: A tall drakyri boy is here, sparring with his sister.
mobiles.description:
Short golden hair frames a handsome, sculpted elvish face and brilliant
green eyes.  He towers several inches above you, yet his honed
muscles maintain the perfect balance of a warrior.  A grey dot in the
center of his forehead marks him as the na'deia (heir) to Xaek.

mobiles.name: drakyri xaek saera ira'deia girl
mobiles.long_description: A slender drakyri girl is here, sparring with her brother.
mobiles.description:
Mithril flashes in a silvery blur as the girl slashes and dodges with
deadly speed and accuracy.  Along her cheekbone is the mark of
an ira'deia.

mobiles.name: grey lion
mobiles.long_description: A massive grey lion stands here.
mobiles.description:
Grey fur shimmers over powerful muscles.  Intelligent golden eyes
follow you warily.

mobiles.name: white lion
mobiles.long_description: A huge white lion prowls here.
mobiles.description:
The lion moves with a powerful, silent grace which is strangely at odds
with her size.  Deep emerald eyes flicker around the room.

mobiles.name: guardian knight
mobiles.long_description: A knight stands here watchfully.
mobiles.description: The knight is tall, powerful, and quite ready to defend.

mobiles.name: drakyri warrior training
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri warrior in training is here, practicing defensive maneuvers.
mobiles.description:
The drakyri works through defensive maneuvers over and over, with
growing agility and quickness.

mobiles.name: drakyri sparring warrior
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri warrior is here, sparring.
mobiles.description: The warrior seems quite intent on weapons work.

mobiles.name: drakyri noriva yxanes deian man
mobiles.long_description: A tall drakyri man stands here.
mobiles.description:
A thin niobium circlet confines short golden hair, framing brilliant
green eyes and a powerfully sculpted elvish face.  Centered between
the arched brows is the shimmering green insignia of myr'vale Noriva:

                           -(+)-

mobiles.name: drakyri noriva nerael deiaya lady
mobiles.long_description: A white clad drakyri lady stands here.
mobiles.description:
Cascades of shimmering hair the color of white gold fall in waves down
the lady's white clad back, between delicate iridescent wings.
Above the fine, high cheekbones, clear silver eyes sparkle with energy.
On her collar, the lady bears the mark of the deiaya of myr'vale Noriva.

mobiles.name: drakyri noriva jorinne sh'aya woman
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri woman is here, meditating.
mobiles.description:
An aura of health and power surrounds her.  A mark on her collar
indicates her rank as sh'aya of myr'vale (minor house) Noriva.

mobiles.name: drakyri noriva lerylke sequen paladin
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri paladin kneels here in prayer.
mobiles.description:
The paladin emanates peace and health.  Contrary to human beliefs,
drakyri paladins do not need to be purely good.  In this case,
Lerylke is the sequen of myr'vale Noriva, a neutral house.  Hence,
he is neutral and worships neutral gods and goddesses.

mobiles.name: drakyri noriva nerr treye male
mobiles.long_description: A male drakyri kneels here, weeding.
mobiles.description:
Despite his scruffy work clothing, Nerr emanates health and power.
His slitted golden eyes are narrowed in concentration as he heightens
the health of the herbs as he weeds.

mobiles.name: drakyri noriva yllyra na'deia lady
mobiles.long_description: A tall drakyri lady is here, studying herb lore.
mobiles.description:
She twirls a lock of shiny white gold hair between her fingers as she
concentrates.  Iridescent wings drape down her back, lifting
occasionally to stretch.  Between her eyebrows shimmers the green
dot of the Noriva na'deia.

mobiles.name: drakyri noriva dryna ira'deia girl
mobiles.long_description: A young drakyri girl hovers here, laughing.
mobiles.description:
Shimmering golden hair falls in a curtain down her back, between
fluttering iridescent wings.  Lively green gold eyes sparkle
with laughter.  Yet beneath the youthful smile, you sense great power.
On one cheekbone, she bears the mark of an ira'deia of Noriva.

mobiles.name: drakyri noriva voryl ira'deian boy
mobiles.long_description: A tall drakyri boy is here, studying.
mobiles.description:
He seems to be engrossed in a tome on healing.  Wavy white gold hair,
cut short, frames a handsome, youthful face and sparkling green eyes.
Along one cheekbone is the mark of a Noriva ira'deian.

mobiles.name: white cat
mobiles.long_description: A white cat is here, basking in the light.
mobiles.description:
Snowy white fur gleams softly in the light.  You feel the urge to pet
it.. but as you reach out your hand, the slitted green eyes snap open
and the cat hisses warningly.

mobiles.name: grey cat silvery
mobiles.long_description: A silvery grey cat prowls silently.
mobiles.description:
Silvery grey fur shimmers in the light.  Bright silver cat eyes
follow you warily.

mobiles.name: drakyri guardian spirit form ghost
mobiles.long_description: A ghostly form hovers here.
mobiles.description:
As you gaze at it, the form seems to sharpen and come into focus.
It appears to be the spirit of a drakyri, long dead and set to
guard here.

mobiles.name: drakyri laerkai flame mage
mobiles.long_description: A powerful drakyri mage stands here, surrounded by an aura of heat.
mobiles.description:
Even her eyes seem to glow with a strange, reddish light.  You
sense an aura of raw magical power around her, controllable only
by the best.. which she is.

mobiles.name: drakyri laerkai shield paladin
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri paladin stands here, glowing with divine power.
mobiles.description:
He seems almost too bright to look at, and you are forced to avert your
gaze after a brief glance.  He is the Shield, one of the most
devoted and powerful of the drakyri knights, and a member of the
elite force of drakyri, the Laerkai.

mobiles.name: drakyri laerkai claw knight
mobiles.long_description: A sinister knight clad in black stands here.
mobiles.description:
The drakyri emanates an aura of pure evil power.  Noting your gaze,
she smiles a cruel not-smile and flexes wickedly sharp taloned hands.

mobiles.name: drakyri laerkai shadow shadows
mobiles.long_description: The shadows are deep here.
mobiles.description:
You notice a slim figure shrouded in the deep shadows.  He turns, and
sharp silver eyes pierce the darkness like knife blades.  His movements
are characterized by a curious catlike grace which betrays extreme
power and agility, both dangerous.

mobiles.name: drakyri laerkai fist warrior
mobiles.long_description: A powerful drakyri warrior stands here.
mobiles.description:
She towers at least a head above you, muscles rippling beneath the
plates of her armor.  Her sheer might would best most warriors in
combat, and as she moves her sword, you see that she has the skill
to be a master.

mobiles.name: drakyri laerkai hand priest
mobiles.long_description: A powerful drakyri priest is here, haloed in white light.
mobiles.description:
Though not much taller than yourself, the drakyri seems to tower
far above you, as if possessed by some divine presense.

mobiles.name: drakyri laerkai master
mobiles.long_description: A slender drakyri stands here, emanating power.
mobiles.description:
The brilliant silver eyes of the master Laerkai look deep into your
own, as if scouring your soul.  She is the leader of the Laerkai, the
elite protective force of the race, a rank which she has won through
centuries of power and loyalty.  Though each of the six Laerkai beneath
her represents a single house and excels in that house's specialty,
the master comes from a union between the Deriki and Myrxes houses.
Trained by both, she has become a lethal blend of sorcery and stealth.

mobiles.name: drakyri guardian
mobiles.long_description: The Guardian watches you measuringly.
mobiles.description:
The Guardian is a drakyri raised and trained specially to guard and serve
the drakyri council.  She excels at many skills, due to decades of
devotion and training, and is a formidable opponent.

mobiles.name: drakyri mediator light
mobiles.long_description: Shifting grey light pervades the room.
mobiles.description:
The light seems to shift and change even as you look at it.  This is
the drakyri Mediator, a blend of the souls of those drakyri who devoted
their lives to the increase of wisdom and willingly gave their souls
in death to serve the council.  The Mediator resides over the council
when it is in session and resolves disputes.  Due to its ancient wisdom,
it passes the final judgment on all issues that affect the race as a whole.

mobiles.name: drakyri knight protector
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri knight protector stands here.
mobiles.description:
This is a knight trained by myr'vale Xaek and sworn to guard and
protect the land and its inhabitants til death.

mobiles.name: drakyri mage protector
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri mage protector stands here.
mobiles.description:
Trained by she'vale Deriki, this mage is sworn to protect the land
and its inhabitants until death.

mobiles.name: drakyri healer
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri healer stands here.
mobiles.description:
This is a cleric trained by myr'vale Noriva to tend to the health
of the land and its inhabitants.  The healer has no allegiances
except to the isle as a whole and answers to no one but the laerkai
master, the mediator, and the warden.

mobiles.name: drakyri assassin
mobiles.long_description: A drakyri assassin merges with the shadows.
mobiles.description:
This drakyri has been trained by myr'vale Myrxes to perform special
jobs in the outside world.  The assassin answers mainly to the laerkai
master, and occasionally to the mediator or warden.

mobiles.name: drakyri shopkeeper frail old man
mobiles.long_description: A frail old man smiles mysteriously at you.
mobiles.description:
You sense something strange about this old man..  Aware of your
scrutiny, he glances up, revealing sparkling blue eyes which hold
a youthful power which is quite at odds with his apparent frailty.
He winks at you and returns to his work.

mobiles.name: drakyri warden
mobiles.long_description: The Warden stands here, guarding the gates.
mobiles.description:
The Warden is one of the most powerful drakyri, assigned to guard the
gates to the isle against hostile invasion.  Her sharp silver eyes,
slitted like a cat's catch and hold your own, seeming to weigh your
very soul.

objects.name: blue marble fountain
objects.description: A fountain of sculpted marble splashes quietly.

extra_descriptions.description:
Blue marble, so dark as to appear black in patches where shadows have
fallen over the stone, has been sculpted into the form of a tall
sorceress, hands raised in the act of casting a spell.  Crystalline
water splashes from the sorceress' open palm, sparkling like colour
spray in the light.  The narrow face and chiseled cheekbones appear
elven, but twin wings rise from the shoulderblades, sculpted feathers
cascading over the sorceress' back like a cloak.

objects.name: black marble key
objects.description: A small key carved of black marble lies here.

objects.name: tentacled key black stone
objects.description: A black stone key carved in the form of 5 writhing tentacles lies here.

objects.name: lapis lazuli statue
objects.description: A lapis lazuli statue of a praying drakyri kneels here.

extra_descriptions.description:
A statue of lapis lazuli rests here, glowing deep blue in the candlelight.
The carved form depicts a kneeling drakyri dressed long flowing robes.
His hands are cupped before him, as if in supplication.  Nestled between
the hands is a carved bowl filled with cloudy white liquid.

objects.name: pool water mirror
objects.description: A pool of water gleams in the light.

extra_descriptions.description:
Though the water in the pool is exceptionally clear, you cannot see the
bottom.  As you gaze into the pool, a fine boned elven face appears next
to your own and seems to smile mysteriously up at you.  The water
ripples and clears, leaving only your reflection.. or perhaps the vision
was just your imagination?  The water sparkles in the light.

objects.name: guardian guardian's key silver
objects.description: An ornate silver key lies here.

objects.name: counter black stone
objects.description: A black counter floats here.  A sign is attached to the counter top.

extra_descriptions.description:
The counter seems to stand on nothing at all.  Your reflection in
the polished stone counter top seems slightly transparent.

The sign reads:

You know me !

Type list to list items.
Type buy to buy something.

objects.name: shimmering curtain light
objects.description: A curtain of shimmering light hangs in midair.

extra_descriptions.description: Peering through the curtain, you see a grove of trees.

objects.name: table stone
objects.description: A large stone table stands here.

extra_descriptions.description:
Engraved across the center of the table are the words:

               D'lan Treviki Drakyri Laerkai

objects.name: mithril ((+*+)) torque deriki
objects.description: An engraved mithril torque glows here.

extra_descriptions.description:
An inscription along the edge reads:

               Sh'evale Deriki Lechandre Deia

objects.name: shimmering blue robe
objects.description: A blue robe shimmers here.

extra_descriptions.description:
An inscription along the edge reads:

               Sh'evale Deriki Lechandre Deia

objects.description: A strange flame hovers here.

objects.description: An intricately engraved ring lies here.

An inscription along the inside of the band reads:

               She'vale Deriki Noriek Deiayan

objects.name: ((+*+)) crest deriki
objects.description: An ornate crest is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
An inscription along the inside of the band reads:

               She'vale Deriki Noriek Deiayan

objects.description: A polished mithril staff lies here.

objects.description: a white shield lies here gleaming.

objects.description: A deep indigo pill lies here.

objects.description: An engraved black helm absorbs the light.

objects.description: A pair of gloves with long, wicked talons lies here.

objects.description: A dark breast plate is here.

objects.description: A dark orb floats here, radiating evil.

objects.description: A dark ring carved with strange symbols lies here.

objects.description: A shadowy black cloak writhes with agony.

objects.description: A dark necklace lies here.

objects.description: A humanoid skull stares at you with empty sockets.

objects.description: A pair of engraved obsidian boots lies here.

objects.description: A silver dagger with a sharply tempered edge gleams wickedly.

objects.description: Some carved obsidian sleeves are here.

objects.description: A black leather collar engraved with shimmering runes lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The runes are in no language that you recognize.  As you gaze at them,
they shimmer, and you feel the urge to wear this collar..

objects.name: demon's wings demon black
objects.description: A pair of membranous black wings lie here.

objects.description: An earring of polished onyx glimmers in the shadows.

extra_descriptions.description:
Below the Myrxes crest is the inscription:

                   Myr'vale Myxes Jaena Deia

objects.description: A pair of dark gloves absorbs the light.

objects.description: Dark sleeves disappear in the shadows.

objects.description: Deep shadows absorb the light.

objects.description: A ring of black panther hair gleams darkly.

objects.description: A sharp mithril arrow gleams here.

objects.description: The crest of house Xaek is here, gleaming.

objects.description: An adamantite longsword of superb craftsmanship gleams here.

objects.description: A beautiful silver signet ring lies here.

objects.name: filligree -(+)- necklace noriva
objects.description: A beautiful filligree necklace bearing the crest of myr'vale Noriva is here.

objects.name: tooled -(+)- boots noriva
objects.description: Some intricately tooled boots stand here.

objects.name: laerkai fury rage
objects.description: A feeling of rage pulses here.

objects.name: laerkai justice shield
objects.description: A finely crafted shield is here.

objects.name: laerkai pain
objects.description: A wave of pain slams into you!

objects.name: shadows laerkai stealth
objects.description: The shadows are deep here.

objects.name: laerkai might platemail plate mail
objects.description: A set of powerful looking platemail is here, humming.

objects.name: laerkai life health aura
objects.description: An aura of health permeates the room.

objects.name: laerkai power presense
objects.description: A presense of tremendous power is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
As you focus on the presense, a thundering voice booms through your
skull:

                  Forged in Fury,
                  Tempered with Justice,
                  Sharpened by Pain,
                  Silenced in Stealth,
                  Strengthened by Might,
                  And bound in Life.

               D'lan Treviki Drakyri Laerkai

objects.name: honed shortsword zedraikis
objects.description: A finely honed shortsword gleams wickedly.

extra_descriptions.description:
A wickedly sharp silvery blue blade gleams above a black wrapped leather
hilt.  An inscription in the face of the blade reads:

              A whisper of mithril
              Cleaving all in its path
              With the fury of fire
              And Zedraikis' wrath!

objects.name: flame balance silver
objects.description: A shimmering silver flame hovers here.

extra_descriptions.description: The flame flickers blindingly, and you are forced to look away.

objects.name: drakyri arm guards pair silvery
objects.description: A pair of silvery arm guards gleam here.

objects.name: drakyri girth silvery
objects.description: A gleaming silvery girth is here.

objects.name: drakyri wrist guard
objects.description: A mithril wrist guard gleams here.
