objects.description: A sharp mithril dagger lies here.

objects.name: green greenish energy pill
objects.description: A greenish pill is here, humming with energy.

objects.name: warp pill
objects.description: A mysterious looking pill lies here.

objects.name: drakyri bow adamantite
objects.description: A huge adamantite bow sits towards to wall.

objects.name: drakyri adamantite lance
objects.description: There is a huge adamantite lance sits towards the wall.

objects.name: drakyri white arrow adamantite
objects.description: A long adamantite arrow sits towards to wall.

objects.name: drakyri arrow adamantite
objects.description: A long adamantite arrow sits towards to wall.

objects.name: drakyri stealth bow
objects.description: A dark stealth bow sits on the floor.

objects.name: drakyri dark arrow adamantite
objects.description: A shadowy long stick sits towards to wall.

rooms.name: Wooded Path
rooms.description:
You stand on a narrow path winding through the forest.  To the south,
the path enters a small grove of trees.

exits.description: The path enters a dark forest to the north.
A grove of trees is visible to the south.

rooms.name: Strange Grove
rooms.description:
The air seems strangely silent here, devoid even of birdsong.  Tall trees
frame the clearing, their leaves motionless in the still air.  In the
center of the clearing rests a circular pool of clear water.  A narrow
path leads into the forest to the north.  A dark stone plaque lies
next to the pool, nearly buried in the grass.

exits.description: A path leads northward between the trees.
Silvery gates.

extra_descriptions.description: Drakyri Isle written by Ydri,  4/96.

rooms.name: Silvery Gates
rooms.description:
You find yourself on a dirt path before a tall gateway.  The double
gates gleam silvery blue in the light, formed of fine bars of mithril
interwoven into an intricate, twisting pattern.  Though the bars are
spaced widely apart in places, you can't seem to see what lays beyond.

exits.description: As you glance at the gates, the pattern seems to writhe and shift.
Strange grow.

extra_descriptions.description: As you glance at the gates, the pattern seems to writhe and shift.

rooms.name: Shimmering Pathway
rooms.description:
Strands of some strange, silvery substance glimmer beneath your feet,
interwoven to form a wide east-west pathway framed by tall trees.
Narrower paths branch off to the north and south, and the pathway
continues east.

exits.description: A narrow path winds northward through the trees.
The pathway continues east.
A narrow path winds southward through the trees.
The pathway ends at tall silvery gates to the west.

rooms.name: Winding path
rooms.description:
You stand on a narrow path of silver strands which winds east and south
here through the trees.  A large house is visible in the distance to
the north.

exits.description: The path continues east.
The path intersects a larger pathway to the south.

rooms.name: Winding path
rooms.description:
The path bends north and west here.  A large blue house is visible
in the distance to the north.

exits.description: The path continues north.
The path continues west.

rooms.name: Large clearing
rooms.description:
The path expands here to form a large clearing framed by trees.  The
ground remains the interwoven silvery strands which formed the
pathway to the south.  A blue courtyard is visible a short distance
off the clearing to the north, and a tall white oak door leads into a
large white house to the west.

exits.description: A blue stone courtyard is visible to the north.
A narrow path winds through the trees to the south.

A white oak door enters the house to the west.  Above the door is
an inscription in gold inlay:

                 - She'vale Treniste -

                        ((-*-))

rooms.name: Winding path
rooms.description:
You stand on a narrow path formed of interwoven strands of some
strange silvery material.  To the south, a bronze door leads into
a house which appears to be made entirely of jade.  A gold inscription
glimmers above the doorway.

exits.description: The path leads north to a larger pathway.

A bronze door leads into the jade house to the south.  Lettered in
gold above the doorway is the inscription:

                  - Myr'vale Noriva -

                         -(+)-

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

                  - Myr'vale Noriva -

                         -(+)-

rooms.name: Shimmering pathway
rooms.description:
You stand on a shimmering pathway formed of strange interwoven silvery
strands.  The pathway continues east and west, framed by tall trees.

exits.description: The pathway continues east.
The pathway continues west.

rooms.name: Shimmering pathway
rooms.description:
A narrow path branches off to the south.  Through the trees, you can
make out the forms of large houses.  A particularly large tree towers
over the pathway to the north.

exits.description:
A large tree towers over the northern edge of the pathway.  The faint
outline of a doorway is barely visible in the craggy bark.
The pathway continues east.
A narrow path winds southward.
The pathway continues west.

rooms.name: Narrow path
rooms.description:
Interwoven silvery strands form a narrow north-south path between the
trees.  Tall wrought iron gates stand to the west of the path,
opening onto a granite courtyard.  The path continues south.

exits.description: The path intersects a wider pathway to the north.
The path continues south.

A huge granite courtyard leading to a huge grey house is visible
through the iron gates to the west.  Engraved in iron at the apex
of the gateway is the inscription:

                       Myr'vale Xaek   ][+][

rooms.name: End of the narrow path
rooms.description:
A short walkway leads east off the path to a set of towering black
gates.  The path leads back northward.

exits.description: The path continues north.
Huge black gates are visible to the east.

rooms.name: Outside of space
rooms.description:
A wave of vertigo washes over you as you gaze around what appears to
be a formless multicolored void.  A variety of strange objects float
around you, enticingly near, yet somehow unreachable.  Before you,
A black counter hangs in midair.

exits.description: A rope ladder descends to the pathway below.

rooms.name: Shimmering pathway
rooms.description:
The pathway continues east and west here.  A strange rope ladder,
formed of the same material as the pathway, hangs suspended above the
road, apparently without support.

exits.description: A grey tower is visible to the east.
The pathway continues west.
A strange ladder dangles here, apparently without support.

rooms.name: Before the Grey Tower
rooms.description:
The pathway ends here at a tall grey tower.  Through the open doorway,
you see marble steps leading up into the tower center.

exits.description: The pathway continues west.
Marble steps ascend into the tower.

rooms.name: Chamber of the Guardian
rooms.description:
Dim torchlight permeates the chamber, filling it with a strange greyish
glow.  The walls, formed of something akin to marble seem impossible
smooth.  Strangely, you can find no seams in the material, as if the
entire tower were carved of a single block of stone.  Marble steps
lead up to double silver doors.

exits.description:
Double silver doors are set into the wall above, fitting seemlessly as
if carved there.
The marble staircase descends.

rooms.name: Council Chamber
rooms.description:
You find yourself in a wide circular chamber carved of the same strange
grey stone as the rest of the tower.  A large crescent shaped table
dominates the center of the room.  Twelve chairs line the outer edge
of the crescent, and a single larger chair rests at the center of the
inner edge.  The crests of each of the six drakyri houses are engraved
in two outer chairs each.  The inner chair is engraved with a depiction
of a circle bisected by a cross.

exits.description: Double silver doors open onto a descending marble stairwell.

extra_descriptions.description:
The crests represent the six drakyri houses.  The crests of the major
houses mark the six western chairs:  She'valen Deriki, Treniste, and
Reykaris.  The six eastern chairs bear the minor house crests of
She'valen Myrxes, Xaek, and Noriva.

rooms.name: Hidden lane
rooms.description:
You stand on a narrow strip of silver leading south to a huge tree
and east to a black oaken door.  The air seems strangely still
and quiet.

exits.description: A black oaken door leads into a grey building to the east.
The lane ends to the south at a huge tree.

rooms.name: Laerkai Headquarters
rooms.description:
You find yourself in a large room enclosed by midnight black onyx
walls.  In the center of the room is a large stone table encircled
by 7 dark stone chairs, each inscribed with a different symbol.

extra_descriptions.description:
Carved into the back of each of six of the chairs is a symbol:
flame, shield, claw, shadow, fist, and hand.  Engraved in the
seventh chair is the whirling blade insignia of the Laerkai Master.

rooms.name: Blue stone courtyard
rooms.description:
Gleaming ice blue stone paves a wide circular courtyard centered by a
sculpted marble fountain.  Strands of silvery green ivy twine around
the encircling pillars, appearing at first glance to be perfectly crafted
works of delicate silver filligree.  A marble archway frames a pair
of gleaming double doors to the north.  Glittering silver forms a strange
symbol above the archway.

exits.description:
Double silver doors lead north into a huge house.  A glittering
symbol is visible above the archway.
Wide stone steps descend to a wide clearing to the south.

extra_descriptions.description:
Silver, inlayed in the dark marble wall, forms the inscription:

                       chain my body
              but you will never enslave my mind

                          ((+*+))

                      She'vale Deriki

rooms.name: Blue Marble Corridor
rooms.description:
Dark blue marble walls frame a wide north-south corridor.  Brilliant
streaks of white slash the darker blue stone like shafts of lightning.
Darker swirls of grey and black twine among the white like shadows.
Archways open east and west, and the corridor continues north.  To the
south, double silver doors are set into the wall.

exits.description: A stairwell is visible in the distance to the north.
An archway open onto a large hall to the east.
Double silver doors gleam beneath a black stone archway.
An archway opens onto a large room to the west.

rooms.name: Wood Panelled Ballroom
rooms.description:
The dark polished stone of a dance floor gleams amidst the oak panelled
walls framing the ballroom.  Silver tapestries adorn the walls, glittering
against the darkened wood.  Suspended from the center of the high ceiling
is an enormous crystal chandelier.

exits.description: A blue corridor is visible through the archway to the east.

extra_descriptions.description:
The chandelier is intricately wrought, delicate despite its enormity.
Suspended from the ceiling, it gives the appearance of some huge,
fragile snowflake frozen in mid-fall.

rooms.name: Dining Hall
rooms.description:
Dark, white streaked blue marble frames a long hall running east and
west.  Dominating the center of the hall is a long table of some
strange ice blue substance similar to metal.  A feast covers the
table top from end to end.  You notice a faint shimmer about a meter
above the table, encasing the entire top.

exits.description: The odors and sounds of cooking drift through the swinging door to the east.
A blue corridor is visible through the archway to the west.

extra_descriptions.description:
It appears to be some sort of magical curtain which serves to both
preserve the food and protect it from uninvited guests.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description:
You stand inside a huge, blue walled kitchen.  Pots and pans hang in
racks along the walls, alongside knife sets and various silver utensils.
Over each hangs the telltale shimmer of a protective shield.  A huge
chopping block dominates the center of the kitchen, littered with 
what appears to be a meal in preparation.  To one side, a lamb sizzles
on a spit.

exits.description:
A swinging door opens into the west wall.  Through the window in the
upper portion of the door, a large hall is visible.

rooms.name: Blue Marble Corridor
rooms.description:
Torchlight flickers over deep blue marble walls, picking out streaks
of white and darker greys.  Silver, inlayed in the dark marble,
forms the the insignia:

                ((+*+))

A winding stairwell is visible to the north.

exits.description: You see a spiral stairwell.
The corridor continues south.

rooms.name: Spiral Stairwell
rooms.description:
A varnished wood stairwell is set against the north wall, spiraling
up and down to disappear into the floor and ceiling here.  A blue
marble corridor runs south.

exits.description: The corridor continues south.
The stairwell disappears above.
The stairwell disappears below.

rooms.name: Granite storage room
rooms.description:
You stand in a dimly lit cavern hewn of solid granite.  Shelves inset in
the rock walls bear a variety of crates and boxes.  Longer crates lean
against the eastern and western walls, filling the gaps between shelves.
A spiral stairwell winds into the light above.

exits.description: Light filters down the stairwell from above.
Several tall crates stand against the east wall.

extra_descriptions.description:
A faint shimmer above the shelves betrays the presence of a protective
curtain.

rooms.name: Magic Workroom
rooms.description:
Shelves line the east and west walls, filled to overflowing with dusty
tomes and stacks of parchment.  Long tables line the two remaining walls
and the center of the floor, stacked with strange implements and
half-written documents.

exits.description: A long bookshelf lines the eastern wall, filled with books.
A long table stands against the southern wall.

Long shelves line the western wall, stacked with sheets of parchment
and vellum.

extra_descriptions.description: A magical barrier shocks you as you reach towards the shelves.
It appears that some sort of arcane studies are in progress here.

rooms.name: Chemical Lab
rooms.description:
One sniff, and a raunchy stench nearly bowls you over.  The sounds of
liquid, bubbling and dripping in the constructions of tubing and beakers
lining the workbenches, fills the air.  Accompanying are clouds of
white and multicolored steam, which accounts for the stench.  Chemists..

exits.description: A workbench leans against the western wall.

rooms.name: Summoning Chamber
rooms.description:
A warning prickle climbs along the back of your spine as you survey the
dark walled stone room.  Inlayed in silver in the center of the floor
is a huge pentagram, filled with strange glimmering runes.  The walls,
in contrast, are plain black stone, polished to a glossy sheen which
seems to soak up the flickering torchlight.  A long stone shelf runs
the length of the north and east walls.

exits.description: A long stone shelf runs along the north wall.

extra_descriptions.description:
A continues stone shelf is carved at about waist height from the north
and east walls.  Strange implements are lined up on the shelf,
accompanied by thick tomes.  Glancing at the title of one, you can
make out the words 'summoning' and 'outer planes'.
A magic curtain glimmers above the shelf, barely visible in the darkness.

rooms.name: Mirrored Hallway
rooms.description:
You stand in a long hallway.  Doors open into the north, south, east,
and west wall.  The walls between the doors are filled with a variety
of strange, warped mirrors, filling the hall with twisted images
of its occupants.  A spiral staircase cuts through the northern
portion of the hall, leading up and down.

exits.description:
A tall oaken door is set into the northern end of the hallway.  A large
square cut ruby lies embedded in the upper portion of the door, above
the ornate inscription:

                She'vale Deriki Tyrena Na'deia

A starlike sapphire is inset into the redwood door to the east.
Beneath the gem, ornate lettering reads:

                She'vale Deriki Daeman Ira'deian

Tiny amethysts form a starburst pattern in the white oak door to the
south.  Below the pattern is the inscription:

                She'vale Deriki Ykandres Ira'deian

Set into the black oak door to the west is a gleaming emerald.
Beneath the gem are the words:

                She'vale Deriki Nalyss Ira'deia

The stairwell ascends above.  Halfway up, diamond inlay in the oak
railing forms the inscription:

                She'vale Deriki Lechandre Deia

                          ((+*+))

                She'vale Deriki Noriek Deiayan
The staircase disappears below.

extra_descriptions.description:
Warped glass mirrors line the walls of the hallway, reflecting strange,
twisted images of yourself back at you.

rooms.name: Emerald Suite
rooms.description:
Deep green tapestries adorn varnished black oak wall panels framing a 
luxurious bedroom suite.  Emerald inlay forms swirling patterns in
the dark ceiling, glittering in the torchlight.  An inscription in
silver is visible above the door to the east.

exits.description: A black oak door exits the suite to the east.

extra_descriptions.description:
The silver lettering reads:

                She'vale Deriki Nalyss Ira'deia

rooms.name: Amethyst Suite
rooms.description:
White oak walls support layers of rich purple tapestries.  Radiating
from the center of the ceiling is a huge starburst pattern, formed of
dozens of glittering amethysts.  Inlayed silver forms an inscription
in the wood above the northern door.

exits.description: A white oak door exits the suite to the north.

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

                She'vale Deriki Ykandres Ira'deian

rooms.name: Sapphire Suite
rooms.description:
You find yourself in a huge suite adorned with azure blue tapestries.
Brass sconces holding torches are spaced along the redwood panelled
walls, each bearing a tiny starcut sapphire.  A matching larger sapphire
is embedded in the center of the ceiling.  Silver lettering glimmers
against the redwood framing the doorway to the west.

exits.description: A redwood door exits the suite to the west.

extra_descriptions.description:
The silver letters form the words:

                She'vale Deriki Daeman Ira'deian

rooms.name: Ruby Suite
rooms.description:
Deep red wall hangings grace the varnished golden oak panelled walls, 
shimmering softly in the torchlight.  Five square cut rubies form a
pentagon shape embedded in the center of the ceiling.  Above the
doorway to the south, a silver inscription gleams against the wood.

exits.description: A redwood door exits the suite to the south.

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

                She'vale Deriki Tyrena Na'deia

rooms.name: Diamond Suite
rooms.description:
White streaked blue marble walls frame an enormous suite decorated with
shimmering white tapestries.  Woven in silver are depictions of
spellcasters in battle, surrounded by strange glyphs and runes.
Inlayed diamond lettering forms an inscription across the center of
the dark marble ceiling.

exits.description: A spiral stairwell leads down.

extra_descriptions.description:
Glittering diamond picks out an inscription against the dark stone:

                She'vale Deriki Lechandre Deia

                          ((+*+))

                She'vale Deriki Noriek Deiayan

rooms.name: Ivory Foyer
rooms.description:
A crystal chandelier hangs suspended in the center of the room, its
bright light gleaming off polished ivory and gold trim.  The huge
white oak entrance door opens into the east wall, framed by a polished
golden oak archway.  A golden crest is emblazoned across the top of the
archway, surrounded by silvery lettering.

An archway opens north, and a hallway leads into the house to the west.

exits.description: A large room is visible to the north.
You see the huge white oak entrance door.
A hallway leads west.

extra_descriptions.description:
Sculpted gold forms the symbol:

                           ((-*-))

The lettering reads:

                    - She'vale Treniste -

rooms.name: Art Gallery
rooms.description:
Shallow niches, spaced evenly along the long white walls of the gallery,
display a wide variety of portraits and figurines, each obviously
valuable and protected behind a glass case.  Low marble pedestals
support larger sculptures in the center of the floor.

exits.description: An ivory foyer is visible through the southern archway.

extra_descriptions.description:
Figurines and larger sculptures, intricately carved from precious metals,
stones, and rare woods, grace the niches and pedestals.

The portraits depict everthing from battle scenes to flowers, all painted
by the hands of master artists and probably worth a fortune.

rooms.name: White Hallway
rooms.description:
Gleaming grey streaked white marble frames a long hallway running
east-west here.  The glow of torches, affixed in golden sconces along
the walls, plays over finely woven tapestries.  Archways open east
and south, and the hallway continues west.

exits.description: A white foyer is visible to the east.
A large hall is visible to the south.
The hallway continues west.

extra_descriptions.description: The tapestries depict slender winged figures engaged in battle.

rooms.name: Dining Hall
rooms.description:
Dim candlelight picks out the golden grains of the oak table stretching
the length of the hall, set with white placemats and matching golden 
silverware.  A wide archway opens north onto a white hallway.

exits.description: A marble hallway is visible to the north.

rooms.name: White Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway stretches west to the base of a spiral staircase and east
towards the foyer.  A polished golden oak archway opens north into a
circular stone chamber.

exits.description: A circular chamber is visible to the north.
The hallway continues east.
A spiral staircase is visible to the west.

rooms.name: Tower Base
rooms.description:
You stand in a circular white marble room, apparently the base of a tall
tower.  A staircase spirals through the center of the room, leading up.
A golden oak archway opens south onto a white hallway.

exits.description: A hallway is visible to the south.
A spiral staircase ascends.

rooms.name: Tower Center
rooms.description:
Curving white marble walls frame a narrow circular room.  The view
from the small windows spaced along the tower walls shows that you are
about 15-20 meters above the ground, on the second floor of the tower.
A spiral staircase winds through the center of the room, leading up
and down.  A glass enclosed tunnel opens off the western face of the
tower.

exits.description:
A glass tunnel crosses the gap between the tower and the second floor
of the house to the west.
The staircase winds upwards.
The staircase winds downwards.

rooms.name: Observatory
rooms.description:
You find yourself about 25 meters above the ground surrounded by glass
walls and a domed ceiling, giving an excellent view of the surrounding
landscape.  A city stretches to the south and east, and a dark blue and
silver house rises to the northeast.  Surrounding the city and stretching
out to the west is a roiling, formless void.  A spiral staircase descends
through the center of the room to the floor below.

exits.description: The staircase winds downwards.

rooms.name: Spiral Staircase
rooms.description:
You stand at the base of a wide spiral staircase ascending to the
second floor.  A white marble hallway stretches east from here.

exits.description: The hallway continues east.
The staircase disappears above.

rooms.name: Second Floor Hallway
rooms.description:
A wide hallway stretches west from here, the gleaming marble walls
broken at intervals by varnished wood doors to the north and south.
Here, a carved oak door opens into the north wall, and a smaller
mahogany door opens south.  A spiral staircase descends to the first
floor.

exits.description:
Carved into the golden grains of the door to the north is the
inscription:

              She'vale Treniste Dosandre Deian

                          ((-*-))

              She'vale Treniste Denylis Deiayan

An inscription is engraved in the mahogany door to the south:

              She'vale Treniste Lyrene Na'deia
The hallway continues west.
The staircase disappears below.

rooms.name: Heir's Bedroom
rooms.description:
A huge, luxuriously appointed bedroom stretches out around you.  Golden
threads, interwoven in the white curtains adorning the walls, glitter
in the torchlight.  A large mahogany door opens northward.  An
inscription is engraved in the center of the door.

exits.description:
A mahogany door is set into the north wall.  An inscription in the
center of the door reads:

              She'vale Treniste Lyrene Na'deia

                    (heir to Treniste)

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

              She'vale Treniste Lyrene Na'deia

                    (heir to Treniste)

rooms.name: Wide Hallway
rooms.description:
You stand at the western end of a wide white marble hallway.  A dark
oaken door opens northward, and an ashwood door opens west.

exits.description:
Inscribed in the oaken door to the north are the words:

              She'vale Treniste Rodwen Ira'deia
The hallway continues east.

Inscribed in the ashwood door to the west are the words:

              She'vale Treniste Josreke Ira'deian

rooms.name: Ashwood Panelled Bedroom
rooms.description:
Varnished white ashwood walls frame a large, well decorated bedroom.
Dark tapestries of battling heroes adorn the walls.  Behind a glass case
affixed to the west wall hang a collection of strange, ornate masks.
To the east, an ashwood door is set into the wall.  Across the top of the
door is a short inscription.

exits.description:
Inscribed in the ashwood door to the east are the words:

              She'vale Treniste Josreke Ira'deian

extra_descriptions.description:
Inscribed in the ashwood door to the east are the words:

              She'vale Treniste Josreke Ira'deian

The warriors all appear to be of slender elven build.  All winged, some
of the warriors battle in midair.

Strange masks, carved mostly of dark wood and painted a variety of
colors.

rooms.name: Dark Oak Panelled Bedroom
rooms.description:
The light from several torches in golden sconces spaced along the oak
panelled walls plays over dark velvet curtains and intricately woven
silken rugs.  A collection of swords gleams beneath a glass case against
the northern wall.  An inscription is carved into the dark oaken door
to the south.

exits.description:
Inscribed in the dark oaken door to the south are the words:

               She'vale Treniste Rodwen Ira'deia

extra_descriptions.description:
The swords all appear finely tempered mithril or silver, each bearing
a different design as well as the Treniste crest.

Inscribed in the dark oaken door to the south are the words:

               She'vale Treniste Rodwen Ira'deia

rooms.name: Marble Sitting Room
rooms.description:
You stand in a large, marble walled sitting room.  Golden holders hold
large white candles set in shallow niches spaced along the walls of the
room.  A glass enclosed tunnel is visible through the sliding door to
the east, and a pair of golden doors opens north.

exits.description:
A pair of golden double doors opens north.  A crest is inset in the white
marble above the doors:

                          ((-*-))
A sliding door opens east into a glass enclosed tunnel.
An oaken door opens southward.

extra_descriptions.description: The tunnel crosses above ground to the white tower to the east.

rooms.name: Golden Bedchamber
rooms.description:
Shimmering golden tapestries hang from the walls, reflecting the torchlight
in a soft golden glow.  The tapestries part across the center of the
north wall to reveal a design inlayed in gold in the white marble.
Double golden doors open into the south wall.  Ornate letters form an
inscription across the center of the doors.

exits.description:
An inscription in the golden doors to the south reads:

              She'vale Treniste Dosandre Deian

                          ((-*-))

              She'vale Treniste Denylis Deiayan

extra_descriptions.keyword: double golden doors ornate letters inscription
extra_descriptions.description:
An inscription in the golden doors to the south reads:

              She'vale Treniste Dosandre Deian

                          ((-*-))

              She'vale Treniste Denylis Deiayan

The design depicts a winged woman garbed in white wielding a blade in
one hand and holding a set of scales in the other.  The face, intricately
carven, is elven in shape.

rooms.name: Glass Tunnel
rooms.description:
You find yourself in a narrow east-west glass tunnel spanning the midair
gap between the tower to the east and the second floor of the house to
the west.  The ground appears to be about 25 meters below, though the
curve of the tunnel floor probably distorts it to seem farther than it is.

exits.description: The tunnel enters a white tower to the east.
A sliding glass door opens west into a large white walled room.

rooms.name: Before the Black Gates
rooms.description:
Huge black gates loom over the path to the east.  What appears to be
a humanoid skull is embedded in the archway above the gates, surrounded
by an inscription in silver.  Tower in the background is a huge black
stone manor.

exits.description: Black gates cut across the path to the east.
A shimmering path is visible to the west.

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

                            ->*<-

                    - She'vale Reykaris -

rooms.name: Black Marble Entryway
rooms.description:
Obsidian wall gleam coldly in the dim torchlight, broken only by the
dark gates to the west and a wide archway leading east.  A symbol is
carved into the stone above the archway.

exits.description: A dark archway opens east.
Black gates open west.

extra_descriptions.description:
Cut into the dark stone, the symbol reads:

                           ->*<-

rooms.name: Domed Room
rooms.description:
Curving obsidian walls arch above, forming a hermispherical ceiling
above the large circular chamber.  Bits of silver and small diamonds,
embedded in the ceiling above, glitter in the faint torchlight, giving
the illusion of an eternal night sky.

exits.description: A dark corridor is visible to the north.
A dark tunnel leads southward.
Huge black gates are visible to the west.

rooms.name: Dark tunnel
rooms.description:
Plain black obsidian walls arch overhead to form a narrow north-south
tunnel.  Deep niches open off the walls of the tunnel to the east, west,
and south.  To the north, the tunnel opens onto a a huge domed room.

exits.description: A domed room is visible to the north.
A deep niche is visible to the east.
A deep niche is visible to the south.
A deep niche is visible to the west.

rooms.name: Dark niche
rooms.description:
You stand in a dark, narrow niche carved of plain black stone.  A
wide black marble pedestal stands in the center of the floor, probably
designed to display some large object.

exits.description: A dark tunnel is visible to the west.

extra_descriptions.description:
A low, wide pedestal carved of black marble.  Scratches and worn patches
mar the polished top of the pedestal.  Strangely, along the sides, you
notice offwhite streaks of what appears to be wax and darker splotches
of something very like dried blood..

rooms.name: Dark niche
rooms.description:
You stand in a dark, narrow niche carved of plain black stone.  A
wide black marble pedestal stands in the center of the floor, probably
designed to display some large object.

exits.description: A dark tunnel is visible to the east.

extra_descriptions.description:
A low, wide pedestal carved of black marble.  Scratches and worn patches
mar the polished top of the pedestal.  Strangely, along the sides, you
notice offwhite streaks of what appears to be wax and darker splotches
of something very like dried blood..

rooms.name: Dark niche
rooms.description:
You stand in a dark, narrow niche carved of plain black stone.  A
wide black marble pedestal stands in the center of the floor, probably
designed to display some large object.

exits.description: A dark tunnel is visible to the north.
Scuff marks are visible in the ground around the pedestal.

extra_descriptions.description:
A low, wide pedestal carved of black marble.  Scratches and worn patches
mar the polished top of the pedestal.  Strangely, along the sides, you
notice offwhite streaks of what appears to be wax and darker splotches
of something very like dried blood..  A crack runs down the eastern
side of the pedestal.

Peering through the crack, you can make out a small carved slot, faintly
resembling a keyhole.

rooms.name: Forbidding Doorway
rooms.description:
Huge double doors, carved of polished black stone, loom forbiddingly to
the south.  The archway surrounding the door is carved in the shape of
5 thick, writhing tentacles, topped by a wicked beaked mouth.  Blood,
both dried and fresh, spatters the door handles, dulling the polished
sheen.  Strange claw marks gouge the stone floor, their depth and width
betraying the dangerous strength of their maker.

exits.description:
Forbidding black doors gleam with an unnatural sheen, made even more
eerie by the streaks of blood spattering the handles and running down
the faces of the doors.
A square shaped opening is visible above.

rooms.name: Pentagram Chamber
rooms.description:
You find yourself in a large chamber hewn of black stone.  A huge
pentagram is etched into the stone of the floor, dominating the center
of the chamber.  A rectangular black altar rises from the space
between the lines in the center of the pentagram.  You notice
trails of blood streaking the floor between the doors and the altar.

exits.description: Huge black double doors loom to the north.

extra_descriptions.description:
Strange runes are engraved in the sides and face of the altar.  The
top of the altar is permanently stained with ingrained blood, and fresher
blood dribbles in streaks down the sides.

A huge pentagram etched into the floor of the room.  Strange glyphs and
runes have been carved in the spaces between the defining lines.

rooms.name: Black Marble Corridor
rooms.description:
Black marble walls tower above, defining a tall corridor leading east
and south here.  The faint odor of what could have been blood lingers
in the air, adding to the gloom of the dark corridor.

exits.description: The corridor continues east.
A large circular room is visible through the archway to the south.

rooms.name: Black Marble Corridor
rooms.description:
The black marble walls gleam coldly in the dim light.  A tall oak
door opens to the north, and a similar ash door opens south from here.
The corridor continues east and west.

exits.description: The corridor continues east.

An ashwood door is set into the southern wall.  An inscription across
the top of the door frame reads:

                  She'vale Reykaris Sorina Ira'deia
The corridor continues west.

rooms.name: Dark ash bedroom
rooms.description:
A single blood red candle in the center of the room bathes the room in
an eerie reddish glow, picking out the dark grains of black ashwood
wall panels.  Reddish silks canopy the large bed resting against the east
wall, and a matching carpet covers the floorboards.  A tall ash door
exits the room to the north.  Golden lettering along the door frame
glitters reddish in the light.

exits.description:
Lettering above the doorway reads:

                  She'vale Reykaris Sorina Ira'deia

extra_descriptions.description:
A single blood red candle balances on a nightstand in the center of the
room.

Lettering above the doorway reads:

                  She'vale Reykaris Sorina Ira'deia

rooms.name: Black oak bedroom
rooms.description:
Black oak wall panels seem to absorb the dim light of the few torches
spaced along the walls.  Braces of throwing daggers gleam from behind a
glass case against the north wall.  A short golden inscription gleams
from above the tall oak door to the south.

exits.description:
A golden inscription above the door reads:

                  She'vale Reykaris Loryn Ira'deia

extra_descriptions.description:
A golden inscription above the door reads:

                  She'vale Reykaris Loryn Ira'deia
The daggers appear finely tempered and quite lethal..

rooms.name: Black Marble Corridor
rooms.description:
The tall black marble walls are broken to the north, east, and south
by doorways.  The door to the north is carved mahogany, to the south
carved ash.  Double black steel doors fill the east wall, framed by
a black stone archway.  Embedded in the apex of the archway is a humanoid
skull, surrounded by gold lettering.

exits.description:
The mahogany door sports streaks of blackened wood.  Engraved above
the doorway are the words:

                  She'vale Reykaris Kranali Na'deian

Towering black steel doors loom to the east.  Around the skull above
the doorway is the inscription:

   She'vale Reykaris Rachal Deia  ->*<-  She'vale Reykaris Toryan Deiayan

Above the ash door to the south is the inscription:

                  She'vale Reykaris Chake Ira'deian
The corridor continues west.

extra_descriptions.description:
The skull gleams whitely against the dark marble archway, its mouth
seemingly fixed in a permanent feral grin.

The lettering reads:

   She'vale Reykaris Rachal Deia  ->*<-  She'vale Reykaris Toryan Deiayan

rooms.name: Ash bedroom
rooms.description:
A humanoid skull hangs suspended from the center of the ceiling, an inner
light giving it's eyes a reddish glow white permeates dimly throughout
the room.  Dark ash wall panels, carved with strange figures, frame the
room.  To the north, an ash door is set into the wall.  Above the door
is a short inscription in gold.

exits.description:
The inscription above the door reads:

                  She'vale Reykaris Chake Ira'deian

extra_descriptions.description:
A reddish light glows from within the skull, beaming eerily from the emtpy
eye sockets and lipless mouth to bathe the room in a dim, bloody glow.
Intricately carved, the figures depict weird, hellish creatures.

The inscription above the door reads:

                  She'vale Reykaris Chake Ira'deian

rooms.name: Charred mahogany bedroom
rooms.description:
Streaks of charred and blackened wood mar the once-reddish brown mahogany
wall panels, as if a thunderstorm once raged through the room, throwing
random bolts of lightning against the walls.  The acrid odor of smoke
permeates the chamber.  Gold lettering gleams above the blackened
mahogany door to the south, somewhow untouched the heat.

exits.description:
Inscribed above the doorway are the words:

                  She'vale Reykaris Kranali Na'deian

extra_descriptions.description:
Inscribed above the doorway are the words:

                  She'vale Reykaris Kranali Na'deian

rooms.name: Dark Chamber
rooms.description:
Black obsidian walls seem to absorb all light in the room, leaving a
forbidding darkness.  Full humanoid skeletons, embedded in the walls around
the room, gleam a ghastly white against the dark stone.  Huge double
black steel doors loom to the west.  Barely visible in the darkness is
an inscription carved into the stone archway framing the doorway.

exits.description:
Above the dark doorway is the inscription:

 She'vale Reykaris Rachal Deia
                                ->*<-
                                       She'vale Reykaris Toryan Deiayan

extra_descriptions.description:
Above the dark doorway is the inscription:

 She'vale Reykaris Rachal Deia
                                ->*<-
                                       She'vale Reykaris Toryan Deiayan

You notice bones rising from the shoulder blades, probably to support
wings.

rooms.name: Quiet foyer
rooms.description:
A still quiet permeates the area, broken only by your movements and the
occasional crackle of flickering torches.  Above the eastern archway,
a stooping hawk is carved into the smooth marble wall.  Archways open
north and south, and an inscription winds around the archway framing the
entrance door to the west.

exits.description: A small alcove is visible to the north.
A small alcove is visible to the east.
A small alcove is visible to the south.

A black oaken door is set into the west wall, framed by a marble archway.
Twining around the archway is an inscription:

                       Myr'vale Myrxes

                 swift      -=+)>      silent

                          ..or dead

                   - flight of the dagger -

extra_descriptions.description:
Twining around the archway is an inscription:

                       Myr'vale Myrxes

                 swift      -=+)>      silent

                          ..or dead

                   - flight of the dagger -

rooms.name: Alcove
rooms.description:
Dim torchlight illuminates the interior of a quiet, stone walled alcove.
Benches line the north, west, and east walls, and an archway leads south.

exits.description: A quiet foyer is visible to the south.

rooms.name: Alcove
rooms.description:
Dim torchlight illuminates the interior of a quiet, stone walled alcove.
Benches line the north, west, and east walls, and an archway leads west.

exits.description: A quiet foyer is visible to the west.

rooms.name: Alcove
rooms.description:
Dim torchlight illuminates the interior of a quiet, stone walled alcove.
Benches line the north, west, and east walls, and an archway leads north.

exits.description: A quiet foyer is visible to the north.
A square shaped crack is barely visible in the stone at your feet.

rooms.name: Plain stone room
rooms.description:
You stand in a plain room hewn of dark grey stone.  Wooden targets affixed
to the walls bear deep gouges and slash marks.  Empty racks, probably
for knives, line the upper northern wall.

exits.description:
You notice a seam in the wall behind one of the targets affixed to the
east wall.
Light from above picks out a square shaped crack in the ceiling.

extra_descriptions.description:
Thick slices of wood have been affixed to the stone walls.  Deep gouge
marks indicate that they have been used for some sort of target
practice.  An unsettling number of the marks are very close to the target
centers.

rooms.name: Dark cavern
rooms.description:
Intricate carvings cover the stone walls, floors, and ceiling.  Most
of the engraving seems to blend into one continuous, amorphous twisting
design, amid which a few recongnizable figures.. an archer, a panther,
a hawk, and a dagger among them.

exits.description: A stalking panther is engraved in the northern wall.
A depiction of a lynx is engraved in the eastern wall.
Intricate engravings wind through the western wall.
An engraving of a stooping hawk dominates the center of the floor.

extra_descriptions.description: You try to follow the design with your eyes, but it eludes you.

rooms.name: Chamber of the Panther
rooms.description:
Engravings of prowling and striking panthers grace the dark onyx walls,
so intricate that they almost seem alive..  The polished form of a
leaping panther arcs above the door to the south, forming an archway.
The door itself is flush with the wall and nearly invisible.

exits.description:
A stalking panther is engraved in the east wall.  Above the panther,
you notice the slim form of a flying dagger.

Carved above the leaping panther, you notice the inscription:

                     Myr'vale Myrxes Nyxi Ira'deia

rooms.name: Chamber of the Dagger
rooms.description:
Grey streaked black marble walls gleam coldly in the dim light, broken
only by the depiction of a thrown dagger in the center of the northern wall.
Resting on a low table in the center of the room is a glass case containing 
3 daggers on black cloth.

exits.description: You see smooth grey streaked black marble.
You see smooth grey streaked black marble.

extra_descriptions.description:
An engraving of a thrown dagger arcs across the northern wall.
Carved along the hilt of the dagger are the words:

                    Myr'vale Myrxes Dyraena Na'deia

You see three daggers, covered by a low glass case.  The central dagger is
thin with a narrow hilt, probably for throwing.  It gleams the silver-blue
of finely tempered mithril.  The crest of Myrxes is engraved in the center
of the hilt.  The eastern dagger is longer and formed of carved onyx.
An engraved black panther stalks along the length of the blade.  Honed
steel forms the third blade, longer than the other two, almost a shortsword.
Carved above the dark grip is a striking lynx.  The shimmer of some sort
of protective magic shield surrounds the case and supporting table.

rooms.name: Chamber of the Lynx
rooms.description:
A striking lynx fills the eastern wall, cut into the otherwise unadorned
black onyx walls of the chamber.  A leaping lynx forms an archway above
the door to the west.  A single emerald forms the eye of the lynx,
glittering against the dark stone.

exits.description: The northern wall is formed of polished black onyx.

Carved beneath the leaping lynx, you notice the inscription:

                   Myr'vale Myrxes Delise Ira'deia

rooms.name: Chamber of Shadows
rooms.description:
Shadows seem to coallesce here, extinguishing nearly all light to
pinpoints, dulling the polished gleam of the framing onyx walls and
ceiling.  Engraved in the southern wall are two hawks, one soaring
and one stooping for a kill.  A midnight black rug, nearly invisible
in the darkness, muffles all sound to mere whispers.

exits.description: Darkness shrouds the gleam of the onyx ceiling above.

extra_descriptions.description:
Beneath the engraved hawks, you notice an inscription in the dark stone:

                  Myr'vale Myrxes Jaena Deia

                            -=+)>

                 Myr'vale Myrxes Neraikis Deiayan

rooms.name: Granite Courtyard
rooms.description:
Thick stone columns frame a wide courtyard paved with rough granite.
Wrought iron gates bar entrance to the courtyard to the east, and a
carved oaken door opens into the large house to the west.

exits.description:
Sturdy iron gates break the surrounding wall to the east.  The thick iron
bars are wrought into the shape of a sword in one gate and a shield in the
other.

A tall oaken door opens into the mansion to the west.  Carven in the
face of the door is a design:

                       Myr'vale Xaek   ][+][

rooms.name: Iron Hallway
rooms.description:
Imposing iron walls tower above to form a long north-south hallway.
Thick steel double doors loom to the west, and a carved oaken door
opens east.  The hallway continues north and south.

exits.description: Huge stone doors are visible in the distance.
An oaken door carved with the crest of house Xaek opens east.
The hallway continues south.
Double steel doors are set into the western wall.

rooms.name: Iron Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway terminates to the south at a thick steel door.  Above the
doorway is the Xaek crest over a crossed shield and sword.

exits.description: The hallway continues north.
A thick steel door opens south.

rooms.name: Private Arena
rooms.description:
Tall iron walls enclose a wide circular arena.  Thick sand covers the
floor, scuffed by recent practice bouts.  Dark clumps of what appear
to be dried blood clot the sand in places.  A thick steel door leads
out of the arena to the north.

exits.description: A thick steel door is set into the north wall.

rooms.name: Training and Practice Field
rooms.description:
A wide grassy field stretches out around you, the grass torn up
frequently, probably by recent weapons practice.  Huge double steel
doors reenter the house to the east.  A long wooden building frames the
rest of the practice field, entered through doors to the north,
west, and south.

exits.description: A plain oak door enters the building to the north.
Double steel doors are set into the wall to the east.
A plain mahogany door opens southward.
An beechwood door opens westward.

rooms.name: Second Comander's Office
rooms.description:
You stand in a sparsely furnished office framed by plain oak panelled
walls.  A desk rests near the western wall, accompanied by several
cabinets.  An oak door to the south leads out of the room.  An
inscription in bronze glimmers above the doorway, the only ornamentation
in the room.

exits.description:
An oak door exits the room to the south.
Above the doorway, a bronze inscription reads:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Rakael Sequas

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Rakael Sequas

rooms.name: First Commander's Office
rooms.description:
Varnished white beechwood walls frame a spacious office.  Polished
forms the floor, and a large window overlooks the practice field
to the east.  Next to the window stands a beechwood door carved with
an inscription in burnished bronze.

exits.description:
A beechwood door leads out of the office to the east.
Carved in bronze are the words:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Nyxil Sh'aya

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Nyxil Sh'aya

rooms.name: Third Commander's Office
rooms.description:
The varnished reddish brown of mahogany wall panels glimmers slightly
in the torchlight.  Darker wood forms a doorframe around the door to
the north.  Engraved above the door is an inscription in bronze.

exits.description:
Engraved in the dark wood above the door to the north is an
inscription:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Yeven Treye

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Yeven Treye

rooms.name: Iron Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway comes to an abrupt end before two huge granite doors.
The depiction of a huge lion is carved in relief at the crest of
the archway above the doors, its sculpted eyes appearing to follow
your every move.  Across the center of the doors, a crest is
carved into the stone.

exits.description:
Huge double granite doors are set into the north wall.  Engraved
across the face of the doors is the house crest, surrounded by
an inscription:

   Myr'vale Xaek Dyana Deia    ][+][    Myr'vale Xaek Ryke Deiayan
The hallway continues south.

extra_descriptions.description:
The crest of house Xaek is engraved in the granite doors, surrounded
by an inscription:

   Myr'vale Xaek Dyana Deia    ][+][    Myr'vale Xaek Ryke Deiayan

rooms.name: Marble Bedchamber
rooms.description:
You find yourself in a huge bedchamber walled with white streaked grey
marble.  Parted white silk tapestries to the north reveal an engraving
of a huge prowling lion.  A white marble archway frames huge double
granite doors in the south wall.

exits.description: Double granite doors lead out of the chamber to the south.

extra_descriptions.description:
The intricate engraving reveals lithe, powerful muscles and a proud
feline head.  Beneath the engraving, you notice the inscription:

                 - Myr'vale  Xaek -

            Strength    ][+][    Power

                        Wrath
                     of the Lion

rooms.name: Jade Entry Hall
rooms.description:
The light from thick wax candles spaced in niches along the walls
plays over jade walls, permeating the hall with a soft greenish glow.
A burnished bronze door stands framed by a dark jade archway to the
north.  A corridor exits the hall to the south.

exits.description:
Carved into the archway above the door is the inscription:

                   Myr'vale Noriva

                        -(+)-

                   House of Healing
A jade corridor leads south.

rooms.name: Jade Corridor
rooms.description:
Polished jade forms the walls of a short north-south corridor, the
green of the stone fading from dark to light and back again.
The walls seem to glow with an inner light, giving the darker portions
the impression of long patches of phosphorescent moss.  A white
door leads east and a glass door south.  The corridor continues west.

exits.description: A jade entry hall is visible to the north.

Set into the eastern wall is a tall white door of varnished ashwood.
Engraved above the doorway is a depiction of an open hand centered over
a glowing ring.

Through the glass door to the south, you can make out the green of
a garden.
The corridor continues west.

rooms.name: Shrine of Healing
rooms.description:
You stand in a small, jade walled shrine.  In the center of the shrine,
a low white marble dais supports a kneeling statue of a praying drakyri.
Arranged around the dais are several padded wooden pallets.  Slim
white candles in niches around the room and on the dais light the room
with a soft glow.  You feel healthy and at peace here.

exits.description:
A white ashwood door opens westward.  Engraved in the face of the door
is the crest of house Noriva.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
The mingled odor of fresh herbs and fresh earth permeates the air with
a sweet earthy scent.  To the east and west, a variety of herbs are 
planted in neat rows, separated by short white markers.  The path on
which you stand winds southwards towards a large white wooden gazebo.
A glass door leads into the house to the north.

exits.description: To the north, a glass door opens into the house.
The path terminates to the south at a large white gazebo.

rooms.name: White Gazebo
rooms.description:
You stand in the shade of a large white gazebo.  Woven wood arcs above,
leaving streaks of light and shadow on the grey marble floor.  A large
herb garden surrounds the gazebo on all sides, save the north, where
a narrow path winds up to a large white house.

exits.description: A garden path winds north towards a large house.

rooms.name: Jade Corridor
rooms.description:
The soft glow of candlelight shimmers over deep green jade walls.
Varnished wood doors lead north, south, and west, and a staircase spirals
upwards towards a pair of double white doors above.

exits.description:
An ashwood door is set into the northern wall.  Gold lettering in the
face of the door forms a short inscription:

                    Myr'vale Noriva Dryna Ira'deia
The corridor continues east.

A redwood door opens southward.  Inlayed in gold in the face of the
door are the letters:

                   Myr'vale Noriva Voryl Ira'deian

A door made of teakwood is set into the western wall.  An inscription
in the face of the door reads:

                   Myr'vale Noriva Yllyra Na'deia

Double white oaken doors are visible above.  Engraved in the marble
archway framing the doors is the inscription:

                  Myr'vale Noriva Yxanes Deian

                             -(+)-

                 Myr'vale Noriva Nerael Deiayan

rooms.name: Candlelit Bedroom
rooms.description:
Light from a single white candle, supported on a table in the center
of the room, glows golden amidst varnished ashwood wall panels.
Engraved in the eastern wall, above the canopied bed, is a depiction
of an open hand over a glowing ring.  A golden inscription glimmers above
the door to the south.

exits.description:
An ashwood doors exits the room to the south.  A golden inscription
above the door reads:

                 Myr'vale Noriva Dryna Ira'deia

extra_descriptions.description: A tall white candle glows brightly.
Beneath the hand is the crest of house Noriva.

The inscription reads:

                 Myr'vale Noriva Dryna Ira'deia

rooms.name: Teak Panelled Bedroom
rooms.description:
The golden grains of teak wall panels glow warmly in the torchlight.
Carved above the doorway to the east is a strange, five-pointed leaf.
Beneath the leaf, you notice an inscription in gold.

exits.description:
Above the teakwood door to the east is an inscription:

                 Myr'vale Noriva Yllyra Na'deia

extra_descriptions.description: A strange five-pointed leaf is carved in the golden wood above the doorway.

The inscription reads:

                 Myr'vale Noriva Yllyra Na'deia

rooms.name: Booklined Bedroom
rooms.description:
Bookshelves line the east and south walls, and a large canopied bed
rests against the west wall.  Battered tomes of herb lore and
handwritten parchment notes are stacked neatly on the shelves, labelled
in some strange, ornate script.  A redwood door opens northward.  Above
the doorway, you notice a short inscription in gold.

exits.description:
Above the redwood door to the north is the inscription:

                 Myr'vale Noriva Voryl Ira'deian

extra_descriptions.description: Myr'vale Noriva Voryl Ira'deian

rooms.name: Sunlit Bedchamber
rooms.description:
Curved glass panels form a domed roof overhead, filling the chamber
with the warm glow of sunlight.  An inlayed engraving of a huge bear
fills the north wall, gleaming gold against the deep green jade.
Double white oaken doors open onto the stairwell to the floor below.

exits.description:
Engraved in gold across the face of the doors is the inscription:

                  Myr'vale Noriva Yxanes Deian

                             -(+)-

                 Myr'vale Noriva Nerael Deiayan

extra_descriptions.description:
The engraving depicts a huge, shaggy bear, an epitome of strength
and health.
